articles.title: Brooks Koepka shares awkward encounter with PGA of America CEO Seth Waugh during trophy presentation - Fox News
articles.description: Brooks Koepka shared awkward encounter with PGA of America CEO Seth Waugh during Sunday's trophy presentation of the PGA Championship.
articles.content:
An awkward moment involving newly crowned PGA Championship
 winner Brooks Koepka and PGA of America CEO Seth Waugh has gone viral on social media and has left many questioning the odd encounter.
